website_summaries.verdict: A fun, easy-to-use mold. Perfect for creating novelty size gummies for gifts.
pros: Large gummy bear is the equivalent to roughly 1,050 standard sized gummy bears
Gummy pops out easily without the use of oil or cooking spray
Kit comes with handy PDF recipe book and clear storage gift bags
cons: Gummy is only roughly the size of your hand

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful giant gummy mold. Was concerned about not applying some sort of oil to be able to get the gummy out, but it came out easily. Using the recipe on the box the bear was tasty, and as firm as a store bought small gummy bear. The only suggestion I would make is to not use a whisk to stir the gelatin mixture together, because it makes tons of bubbles you just can’t get rid of. If you look at the picture, the lighter colored centimeter at the back is because of whisked bubbles. Would highly recommend this mold to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shirk

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: I make my father a giant gummy bear (with sugar free jello) every year. I bought the mold this year and it works very well. The bear pops out much easier than the metal cake pan I've used in the past. If you wanted to make a giant gummy bear, this mold is right on the money.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Giant Yummy Bear!
customer_reviews.text: It's a giant gummy bear! What's not to love?! I purchased this to make my son a few for his 13th birthday and so far so good. Can't comment on the flavor or consistency just yet but I did modify the recipe to a true and tested recipe we did earlier this summer. So far it looks cute and it popped right out of the mold although I did spray it first...I wasn't taking any chances on it getting stuck. Just buy it and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: BBRenteria

customer_reviews.title: Gummy bears for days
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. Best random buy ever! The recipe is super easy and the gummy bear turned out perfect the first time. I know some lucky people that are getting giant gummy bear gift 🐻
customer_reviews.author: nickat13

customer_reviews.title: SMALLER THAN YOU THINK
customer_reviews.text: They say it a "gaint gummy bear". It's not as big as what I was expecting. This is still small. I wouldn't have bought this if I truely knew the size. I wanted bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Truth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Giant Gummy Bears!
customer_reviews.text: Comes clean easily in the dish washer and makes adorable bears. I make candy for my family’s small business, and this mold has been perfect. I have given one (the cherry bear pictured) as a gift, and the birthday boy loved it! I highly recommend this mold. The bags worked well with my mini heat sealer as well. I recommend skimming the top of the bear if you use this for jello/gummy bears. The foam raises to the top and hardens too gummy to remove after.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee Sims

customer_reviews.title: BIG HIT
customer_reviews.text: Actually I used this mold for resin to make bears for my grandkids, turned out awesome. Didn’t realize just how big it was. Easy to remove from mold. May buy another use as a jello mold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the mold
customer_reviews.text: Works great I did decide to use juice instead of water I like the flavor better. I also added 1/4 cup of honey and a 1 tbsp of citric acid for flavor. The citric acid was to make it sour.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bowerman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and phenomenally fun!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and phenomenally fun! Terrific product with a perfect amount of bear detail without making it hard to remove the item from the mold.
customer_reviews.author: suzettie spaghetti

customer_reviews.title: birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my Teenage son for Christmas because he enjoys making his own candies and this silicone mold is easy to clean and use. It is very sturdy and great quality. Not only that but he enjoys eating a large gummy bear pieces off one ear and foot at a time. What kid wouldn't love that?
customer_reviews.author: Laird

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with this mold
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this mold. The recipe included on the package is just right, and the finished product is very easy to remove from the mold after about 4 or 5 hours of refrigeration. It looks and tastes just like a giant gummy bear!
customer_reviews.author: womanswork

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Used to make a massive cbd & THC infused gummy. Used strawberry and banana smoothie with agar agar instead of gelatin to make this vegan too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mold! The basic gummy bear recipe was super easy to follow. It even created a little extra mix that I poured into some chocolate molds I had. I used a nonstick pot to mix and the mess just peeled out after it was cooled off. The gummy bear came out of the mold with no problem. Will definitely be using it often!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Great for birthday parties!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make a gummy bear for my nieces birthday. I was skeptical at first because I didnt know how good they would come out of the mold. I was surprised to see the bears came out easily and my nieces were over the moon when they got the bears. I have many more requests for future birthdays!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We made a gummy out of jello and gelatin, just as the instructions on the box say. It worked like a charm. My kids were thoroughly impressed and want to make a new gummy this week. It only took about three hours to set.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love the Jumbo Gummy Bear
customer_reviews.text: Love the Jumbo Gummy Bear. It is the best. I hope they do start offering the Bags for sale that the Gummy Bears go in. My grand children love them.
customer_reviews.author: Copboots

customer_reviews.title: It’s so freakin cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is just so easy to use and the mold to me looks like a pig but when the product comes out it’s a bear all my grandkids and some of the adults are having me make them gummy bears love it! I will have to get 2 more to keep up with the orders
customer_reviews.author: teresa lipford

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit smaller than I was hoping but still makes a big gummy
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, easy to remove, easy to clean. Comes with a handful of gift bags. Umm flavor? Let me check... Yep tastes like silicone... 1 star for flavor
customer_reviews.author: Seanzo Gonzorelli

customer_reviews.title: High quality silicone.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good thick silicone mold not flimsy or to thin to be able to use many times. Was able to use it twice in a row the first day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: With the gummy recipe we found it takes 3 boxes of jello and it’s so easy to remove and clean
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. With the gummy recipe we found it takes 3 boxes of jello and it’s so easy to remove and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good mold for multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Very good mold I used it with chocolate and it came out perfectly. Also tried with jello and it came our great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a class project and it held up well. Kids loved it, and I will be able to use again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: This mold is great though a bit hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hanson

customer_reviews.title: DIY Giant Gummy Bear Mold
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gummy bear mold product on the market right now. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Wenndie

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for 12 yo for Christmas. She ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 12 yo for Christmas. She has braces and can’t eat gummy bears. She’s made a giant jello gummy bear and giggled while she ate it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Talavera

customer_reviews.title: Lost recipe
customer_reviews.text: I cant really review the product that much, because I lost the recipe! Would any one be able to share it with me ?
customer_reviews.author: Joao Zarur

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The mold worked great for making the gummy bear. Maybe better directions (little more detail) for those who haven't made a gummy before
customer_reviews.author: eraitt

customer_reviews.title: Giant Gummy Bears!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, So Good. We have made 3 giant gummy bears and 1 giant chocolate bear. The mold stands up to the heat very well. Its easy to get both the gummys and the chocolate out of the mold. No need to use any sprays.The recipe on the box for gummy works very well. The mold cleans very easily. Only problem is, I wish it came with more gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: R6 Ridaz

customer_reviews.title: I loved the Gummy Bear Mold so much that this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Gummy Bear Mold so much that this is the second one I bought! I have already made 3 giant gummy bears and gave away as gifts. Believe they were a hit, one lady thought I bought the gummy bear and I told her I made it. She was surprised to hear that you can buy molds. I just wish the company sold the bags on their own. I would love to continue to make this as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Francisca Molina

customer_reviews.title: If I can make this, you can make this!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Giant gummy bear and Very easy to make! I reallly hope people will avoid paying Ridiculous prices from certain online candy co’s (vat19) where the shipping is insane. This was so easy to make, tasty and the final outcome was very pleasing to the eye! I didn’t want my family to devour it bc I was so proud of how cute this came out!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G.

customer_reviews.title: Gummy bears
customer_reviews.text: Made great bears for my daughter's gummy bear party. Best recipe I found was: 2.5 cups of water 1 of the big packets of Jello 2 packs of plain gelatin Heat in a sauce pan until gelatin is dissolved. Pour straight into the mold
customer_reviews.author: J Gable

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and makes a great gift. We made one for my son for Christmas - made the giant gummy, gave that to him first, then gave him the mold. Zero complaints and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The recipes they give you with the bear are terrible. Please disregard those
customer_reviews.text: The recipes they give you with the bear are terrible. Please disregard those. The mold itself is pretty sturdy and easy to take off. Only use this one on special occasions since it is gigantic.
customer_reviews.author: DOnny Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is really fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun to use. We made Christmas gifts for all my nieces and nephews. The recipe included works great. One of my best purchases of the year.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Fun product.
customer_reviews.text: The mold is great. the recipe for the gummy bear is not that tasty. However, it offers multiple uses, so I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Aksena

customer_reviews.title: the gummy recipe we used didn't taste so great.
customer_reviews.text: the mold works well. the gummy recipe we used didn't taste so great.
customer_reviews.author: shannon johnson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome and fun product for any gummy bears lovers 
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome and fun product for any gummy bears lovers . We already made two bears with my 11 years old daughter. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this products, works just as described.. I didn’t like the recipe and neither did the kids but the product does what it’s intended! Also love that it came with gift bags!
customer_reviews.author: Ohshes_stine

customer_reviews.title: It was everything i was hoping for. I put ...
customer_reviews.text: It was everything i was hoping for. I put my jello shot mix in it and was the hit of the party!
customer_reviews.author: noe flores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, so cute when the bear comes out.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN R.

customer_reviews.title: Good mold, not so good recipe
customer_reviews.text: The mold is good.... the recipe that comes with it, not so good.. I will have to try again using a different recipe ...
customer_reviews.author: Annie

product_meta.title: DIY Giant Gummy Bear Mold by Mister Gummy | PREMIUM Quality Silicone + 2 RECIPES and 5 GIFT BAGS Included | Make BIG Bear Treats! (Gummy, Cakes, Breads, Chocolates, and More) - (Green)
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY SILICONE: LFGB approved, BPA FREE, Food-Grade, NON-Toxic, Safe, 100% Pure Silicone. Highest quality assurance!

YOUR OWN INGREDIENTS: Create healthy, nutritious, and delicious bear shaped treats the way you want it! Eliminate or replace unwanted ingredients and control your flavors; catering toward your own personal preferences. We also included our own recommended recipes with directions right on the box to help you get started!

STORAGE-GIFT BAGS INCLUDED: Especially for your convenience, comes with Food-Grade Gift and Storage Bags for you to store your finished gummy bears in for later snacking or to prepare as a delicious gift created personally by you!
MISTER GUMMY 100% ORIGINAL DESIGN: Designed and crafted completely by Mister Gummy, with careful attention to shape and structural integrity!
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! Have any issues, questions, concerns, or comments? Please feel free to contact us via email and we will gladly assist you. Your complete satisfaction is a top priority!
